New Records: Giancarlo Stanton has reached 300 doubles in his career.
Key Match Events: Kyle Gibson pitched 7 strong innings for the Cardinals, allowing only 1 earned run and striking out 6.
Brendan Donovan hit a home run and had 3 RBIs for the Cardinals.
Giancarlo Stanton had a pinch-hit appearance and drove in 3 runs for the Yankees.
